quote: Belief is made up of the same non-substance of which we ourselves are composed. The test of any belief system, then, is the degree to which this same light is permitted to shine through.
quote_letters: BELIEF IS MADE UP OF THE SAME NON-SUBSTANCE OF WHICH WE OURSELVES ARE COMPOSED THE TEST OF ANY BELIEF SYSTEM THEN IS THE DEGREE TO WHICH THIS SAME LIGHT IS PERMITTED TO SHINE THROUGH
